message_1: If a car is traveling at a constant speed of 60 mph, how long will it take for the car to travel a distance of 180 miles?
message_2:
To find the time it takes for the car to travel 180 miles at a constant speed of 60 mph, we can use the formula:

Time = Distance / Speed

Time = 180 miles / 60 mph

Time = 3 hours

So, it will take the car 3 hours to travel a distance of 180 miles at a constant speed of 60 mph.
